name: Image Analysis Tools
description: Image analysis and understanding using Groq's vision model. Analyze images and answer questions about them.

tools.description: Analyze an image using Groq's vision model and answer a question about it
tools.use_when: User has an image file and wants to understand its contents, describe it, or ask questions about it
tools.not_for: Web image search (use search_tools), Wikipedia images (use wiki_tools)

parameters.name: image_path
parameters.description: Local file path to the image

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Question to ask about the image

tools.returns: Dictionary with answer to the query, original query, and image path
example_queries: Can you read the text in this picture?
Analyze this chart and explain it
